page.title: 04INDUSTRY IN HASTINGS
page.content: Traditionally most of the work in Hastings came from fishing. From the end of the last century tourism became the most important occupation. This has also declined and light industry has been developed. There are three industrial estates which provide work. Other work is in services such as shops, banks, schools, hospitals and catering. Less than half the people in Hastings are employed but this is partly because of the high proporyion of retired people in the population. Hastings would like to attract more industries especially those connecte with science and technology.
